comments.body:
Can you manually package the license:

https://conda-forge.org/docs/meta.html#packaging-the-license-manually

and include the following issue link as a comment in the reipe:
https://github.com/formencode/formencode/issues/91

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +29,33 @@about:
  home: http://formencode.org
  license: MIT
  license_file: '{{ environ["RECIPE_DIR"] }}/LICENSE.txt'  # Also see: https://github.com/formencode/formencode/issues/91
  summary: 'HTML form validation, generation, and conversion package'
